name: Hentai Blackjack
description:
Hentai Blackjack is a casual blackjack game where you play with beautifully illustrated cards.Features:
- Play a fully featured Blackjack game with online leaderboards!
- Relax yourself with gorgeous illustrations created exclusively for the game.
- Beautiful relaxing soundtrack and wonderful sound effects.
- Some sexy girl voices too!
- Wonderful image gallery for your enjoyment.
- Achievements.
